description:
<p>We are looking for a committed and caring phlebotomist to join our large practice team. Proposed working hours are Monday 8am - 5pm, Tuesday 8am - 12pm, Wednesday 8am - 5pm, Thursday 8am - 12pm & Friday 8am - 12pm.</p>
<p>For further information or an informal discussion please contact Mrs Jane Thomas, Senior Practice nurse. Tel 01656 304216 or via email enquiries.w95041@wales.nhs.uk</p>

hiringOrganization.name: GP Practices - Cwm Taf Morgannwg University Health Board

title: Phlebotomist
